attributes.additional_details:
The reason for this petition is due to the chaos of parking caused by the Gravesham & Dartford Muslim Association centre on Albion Terrace. 
During the times of 12.00-14.00 every Friday, guests attending prey cause chaos to residents by double parking, and parking in available space in these streets resulting in residents having no where to park or parking on double yellow lines. There is a car park located 2 minutes away at The Promenade, but they will not use this because of cost.
attributes.background: As outlined above, I would like to extend the parking restriction timings within Russell Road, Norfolk Road, Suffolk road & Albion terrace from 10.00-11.00am to a longer period of 8.00am-18.00pm.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
